fields.description: With the new version of iOS revealed, we need to support existing apps running on iOS 7. This _does not_ include the addition of any new iOS 7-specific features. That will be filed as separate tickets.
fields.summary: iOS7: Update SDK to support building/running apps for iOS 7

comments.body: All related links are closed. Any additional tickets we will link to this one, but no need to reopen--we will treat as individual bugs.
